title: Bug 5473 - ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473 - ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces in Build 200110251.
OB: When executing ShiftLeft with a combination of tabs and spaces, nothing happens.
EB: Executing ShiftLeft with a combination of tabs and spaces should properly indent the selected lines.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open a default text editor.
2. Type in the following:
   - A space
   - A tab
   - Some text
   - A tab
   - Some text 2
3. Highlight the two lines above.
4. Execute the ShiftLeft command.

Expected result: The selected lines should be indented properly.

Actual result: Nothing happens when executing the ShiftLeft command.
